p: During the purification process of compound ( 1), a second minor sesquiterpene was obtained as a by-product, and it was identified as caryophyllene oxide ( 2) by 1H and 13C NMR experiments [ 26]. Its amount and purity were not sufficient to measure reliably the specific rotatory power; however, it showed to be levorotatory. According to 1H NMR, the purity of compound ( 2) can be estimated of about 85%.
